subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: New York City F.C. won the first official match in its history as Coach Jason Kreis once again made clear that he intended to construct the team in the mold of Manchester City.
snippet: New York City F.C. won the first official match in its history as Coach Jason Kreis once again made clear that he intended to construct the team in the mold of Manchester City.
